pages.title: PG.1
pages.markdown:
Untitled

## Page pg1

What is your favorite thing about being a teacher?

I love getting to make relationships with my students, getting to see their creativity, and knowledge grow throughout the year.

Why did you start teaching at New Home?

I felt like this is the school God wanted me to be at, so I'm here. I have been teaching here for 6 years and I love it. I teach a lot of English and I love AP English.

Who or what makes you who you are?

Jesus is definitely at the center of why I do what I do. My family really shaped me, and now my husband and son.

What is the theatre program looking like this year? Do you think y’all will make it far?

The program is looking good, we have a lot less crew than we did last year, so that part is a little nerve racking. Overall I think we are doing great, we have more commitment than we’ve ever had. I think we should do pretty good this year.

What is your favorite thing about being a mom?

Getting to hear my son laugh, and watching him grow up. It is fun knowing that I get to raise a young man that is just good.

Where do you see yourself or want to see yourself in the next ten years?

Hopefully still in the classroom, I would love it to be here at New Home. I just see myself still teaching. Teaching is pretty much what I’ve always wanted to do. I started my major in missions,
